constraints.name: king_shaman_power_sum
constraints.description: 一个国王萨满的魔法力量必须等于其所有前任萨满的魔法力量之和。
constraints.formal: a[j] == sum(a[i] for i in range(1, j)) if j is a king-shaman

constraints.name: unique_king_shaman_index
constraints.description: 如果存在多个国王萨满，输出任意一个国王萨满的索引即可。
constraints.formal: if multiple king-shamans exist, output any one of their indices
